processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the John H. Squires Papers was completed prior to 2011. Additional description was completed in March 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: John H. Squires was a native a North Carolina and later worked there as a banker. Squires was educated at Virginia Tech (B.S., Agriculture, 1905; M.S., 1906) and later attended Cornell University (Ph.D., 1909). Squires died March 14, 1934.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains papers relating to Squires' will, with affidavits, notes regarding stocks, and correspondence. Correspondence with Julian Burruss indicates Squires donated money to Virginia Polytechnic Institute at the time of his death. The collection also includes a copy of his will with supporting documentation.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is in chronological order. Undated materials are at the end.
